events.title: SEC Charges Crypto Exchange with Operating as Unregistered Securities Exchange
events.summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission charged a major cryptocurrency exchange with operating as an unregistered securities exchange, broker, and clearing agency. The action follows a months-long investigation into the platform's operations.

events.title: MAS Publishes Guidelines on Digital Payment Token Services
events.summary: The Monetary Authority of Singapore issued comprehensive guidelines for entities providing digital payment token (DPT) services, covering customer due diligence, technology risk management, and business continuity planning.

events.title: ESMA Updates Q&A on MiCA Implementation
events.summary: The European Securities and Markets Authority published updated questions and answers on the Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation (MiCA), clarifying requirements for crypto-asset service providers.

events.title: VARA Grants Full Operational License to Digital Asset Custodian
events.summary: The Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority issued its first full operational license to a digital asset custodian, marking a milestone in Dubai's regulatory framework development.

events.title: FSA Issues Warning on Unregistered Crypto Asset Exchange
events.summary: Japan's Financial Services Agency issued a warning to the public regarding an unregistered cryptocurrency exchange operating without proper authorization.

events.title: SEC Approves Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications
events.summary: The Securities and Exchange Commission approved multiple spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund applications, marking a significant development in cryptocurrency market access.

events.title: MAS Announces Stablecoin Framework Consultation
events.summary: The Monetary Authority of Singapore launched a consultation on proposed regulatory requirements for stablecoin issuers, focusing on reserve management and redemption rights.

events.title: ESMA Report on Crypto Market Trends Q4 2023
events.summary: The European Securities and Markets Authority released its quarterly report analyzing crypto market trends, highlighting growth in DeFi protocols and institutional adoption.

events.title: SEC Staff Issues Accounting Bulletin on Digital Assets
events.summary: The SEC staff published Staff Accounting Bulletin providing guidance on the accounting treatment of digital assets held by entities, clarifying fair value measurement requirements.

events.title: VARA Updates Marketing and Promotion Rules for Virtual Assets
events.summary: The Virtual Assets Regulatory Authority published updated rules on marketing and promotion of virtual assets, introducing stricter disclosure requirements.

events.title: FSA Publishes Annual Report on Crypto Asset Monitoring
events.summary: Japan's Financial Services Agency released its annual report on crypto asset exchange monitoring, detailing inspection findings and compliance trends.

events.title: MAS Finalizes Technology Risk Management Guidelines for DPT Providers
events.summary: The Monetary Authority of Singapore finalized technology risk management guidelines for digital payment token service providers, effective Q2 2024.
